items.name: theme-foundation
items.title: Foundation Educational Theme
items.description: Age-appropriate theme for middle school learners (ages 11-14) with larger touch targets, higher contrast, and engaging visual elements
items.author: NOLA Education <team@nolaeducation.org>

items.name: theme-pathways
items.title: Pathways Educational Theme
items.description: Age-appropriate theme for high school learners (ages 14-18) with modern design patterns and balanced visual hierarchy
items.author: NOLA Education <team@nolaeducation.org>

items.name: theme-professional
items.title: Professional Educational Theme
items.description: Sophisticated theme for post-graduate learners (ages 18+) with information-dense layouts and refined visual treatments
items.author: NOLA Education <team@nolaeducation.org>

items.name: education-themes
items.title: Complete Educational Theme Collection
items.description: All three NOLA educational themes (Foundation, Pathways, Professional) for age-appropriate learning experiences
items.author: NOLA Education <team@nolaeducation.org>
